PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: It was my master's seminar work in which I did a survey and study on complete pipeline for query understanding in a web search engine.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Plant Disease Recognition by analyzing its leaf image (SURA Project)
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: The project was under Summer Undergraduate Research Award (SURA), for which only 4 students were selected from 2nd year of CSE class. We worked on problem to classify plant species and then further recognize its healthiness or class of disease using its leaf image.
Secured 19th rank out of 196 teams. It was a contest held on Kaggle by Yandex with the task to re-rank the 10 web results, by considering personal preferences.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Augmented Reality app. for Virtual Tagging (Microsoft Code.fun.do Hackathon)
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
Developed an augmented reality application on windows phone, which allows users to place virtual tags and marks on real world objects, which will always be sustained (virtually) at the same place, and will be displayed on the app. in the same location context.

Our team stood among top 5 campus teams, and was selected in finalist forum. Stood 9th for good design in 'Design Milestone' and 3rd for good code in 'Coding Milestone' among selected 46 teams in finalist forum from top Indian Colleges.
Secured 28th rank globally. Search engine Baidu kept the contest as part of conference CIKM 2014. The task was to classify the query in one of the given intents.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Mining Interesting Trivia for Entities from Wikipedia
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: It was my master's thesis topic, in which we developed a novel ML based algorithm to mine interesting trivia for any given entity from Wikipedia. The work got published at IJCAI-2015, an A* conference.
